attributes.action: Allow the sale of laser pointers above 1 mW to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many reasons for more powerful laser pointers to be available to the public:

    *  Professional Presentations, standard laser pointers won't cut it when trying to point out details on a bright projection to a large room.

    * Astronomers pointing out constellations and stars in the night sky, standard lasers can't easily be seen when pointing away.

    * Birdwatching

    * Tour Guides

    * Construction engineers and workers pointing out points of interest on a project

    * Camping

    * Hiking

But mainly, personal liberty. 

As long as they are used responsibly (possibly with an age limit), there should be no reason to deny British citizens the right to own one of these devices.
